thread.title: Bayern Munich 5-1 Arsenal: Oliver Kahn insists he's never seen a team as bad as Arsenal | Metro News
thread.title_full: Bayern Munich 5-1 Arsenal: Oliver Kahn insists he's never seen a team as bad as Arsenal | Metro News

author: Sean Kearns For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Bayern Munich 5-1 Arsenal: Oliver Kahn insists he's never seen a team as bad as Arsenal | Metro News
text:
Follow us I’ve never seen a team play as badly as Arsenal against Bayern Munich, says Oliver Kahn Sean Kearns for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 11:44 pm Arsene Wenger’s side were humiliated against Bayern Munich (Picture: Getty) 
Bayern Munich legend Oliver Kahn said Arsenal’s display at the Allianz Arena was as bad as he’s ever seen an opposition side. 
The Gunners lost 5-1 in Germany thanks to goals from Arjen Robben, Thiago (x2), Robert Lewandowski and Thomas Muller. 
Alexis Sanchez’s goal meant Arsenal were level at half-time but they capitulated after the interval and need a miracle to overturn the tie in the second leg. 
Kahn spent 14 years at Bayern but says he’s never witnessed a side play as badly as Arsenal did during the defeat in Germany. Arsenal conceded four times in the second half (Picture: Getty) 
‘I’ve never seen a team play so bad,’ said Kahn. 
‘Bayern played a team so catastrophically bad without the ball 
‘The players were so passive, especially Özil. It’s as if they don’t take the coach seriously anymore.’
